text: Yuki Isoya (born February 17, 1972) is a Japanese singer. Isoya debuted as a singer of the group Judy and Mary in 1993. Judy and Mary broke up in 1999. She began her solo singing career in February, 2002. Isoya has released four albums. Category:Japanese singers Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Hokkaido
title: Yuki (singer)
